name: Capture the Flag (itch)
description:
Complete each level forwards, defeat a boss, retrieve the flag, and complete the level backwards to progress. Avoid dangerous pits and enemies. Losing all of your lives will reset your run. Beat all of the levels to unlock a second mode.

Game by: Mathew Rubino

Music: tebruno99 - The Rush

Sounds Provided by: dklon, Jesús Lastra, and @Shades (https://opengameart.org)
